name: Twitter Capabilities
description: Evaluation dataset for Twitter/X subagent capabilities including posting, direct messages, lists, bookmarks, and user interactions. Includes lazy queries, intentional mistakes, and ambiguous items.

items.expected_output: Create a post with text 'Hello world!'.
items.context: User wants to post a tweet

items.expected_output: Search for tweets matching query 'AI'.
Get user's home timeline or reverse chronological timeline.
items.context: User wants to see their feed

items.input: like the tweet about product launch
items.expected_output: 1. Search tweets about product launch. 2. Like the tweet.
items.context: User wants to like a tweet

items.expected_output: 1. Search for announcement post. 2. Retweet it.
1. Find user @friend. 2. Create DM conversation. 3. Send message about meeting.
items.context: User wants to send direct message

items.expected_output: Get recent direct message events.

items.input: bookmark the tweet about tech news
items.expected_output: 1. Search for tech news tweet. 2. Add to bookmarks.
Get bookmarks for authenticated user.
Create a new Twitter list with name 'Tech Leaders'.
1. Find list 'Tech'. 2. Find user @elonmusk. 3. Add member to list.
items.context: User wants to add member to list

items.expected_output: 1. Get user's tweets. 2. Get likers for the latest tweet.
items.context: User wants to see who liked tweet

items.expected_output: 1. Find user @nasa. 2. Follow user.
1. Find user @spammer. 2. Mute user by ID.

items.input: reply to the tweet about conference
items.expected_output: 1. Search for tweet about conference. 2. Create reply tweet.
items.context: User wants to reply to tweet

items.expected_output: 1. Get user's tweets. 2. Find tweet about typo. 3. Request confirmation. 4. Delete tweet.
items.context: User wants to delete tweet - needs consent

items.expected_output: 1. Recognize 'twtter' as typo for 'twitter'. 2. Get user's followers.

items.input: quote tweet the product launch with my thoughts
items.expected_output: 1. Find product launch tweet. 2. Create quote tweet with user's text.
1. Get user's recent tweets. 2. Get retweeters for the tweet.
Get lists owned by authenticated user.
items.context: User wants to see their lists

items.expected_output: 1. Find user @oldaccount. 2. Unfollow user.

items.input: hide reply to my tweet about pricing
items.expected_output: 1. Find tweet about pricing. 2. Find reply. 3. Set reply visibility to hidden.

items.input: get tweets from list Tech News
items.expected_output: 1. Find list 'Tech News'. 2. Get list posts timeline.
1. Find users. 2. Create group DM conversation.
1. Find list Favorites. 2. Pin the list.
